properties.name: broker-config.management-endpoint
properties.description: ECS Management API endpoint URL.  Should be a HTTP or HTTPS URL with port

properties.name: broker-config.namespace
properties.description: An ECS namespace in which to contrain broker created/managed resources.

properties.name: broker-config.replication-group
properties.description: The ECS replication group in which to create object buckets.

properties.name: broker-config.repository-endpoint
properties.description: Optionally specified endpoint for repository S3 operations for storing broker metadata.
